item.title: Quality smelting base
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:11, topic:534212”][quote author=Strucker link=topic=653010.msg4375816#msg4375816 date=1382036877]
thanks guys i love you all <3

edit to make it iterate for 10 times here

[code] /*
* To make the ore smelt five times, the code will be called, over and over, until its not needed
*
* @param player
* the player that will smelt the five ores
*
* @param button
* the button that the player will click
*
* @param ticks
* the number of ticks before we smelt again
*/
public static void smeltTeneOre(final Player player, final int button, final int ticks) {

	/*
	 * If it has already been executed 5 times
	 * set the times to 5 again, and returns
	 * so we dont execute the code again
	 */
	if(player.tenTimes == 0) {
		player.tenTimes = 10;
		return;
	}
	
	/*
	 * Decreases the times that it 
	 * has to be executed
	 */
	player.tenTimes --;
	
	/*
	 * Closes the interface made on the chatbox to pick the bar, we don't want the player
	 * to click the interface over and over again.
	 */
	player.closeInterface();
	
	/*
	 * A new chance of being true or false 
	 * used for the iron making wich is 50% made and 50% lost
	 */
	randomizeSuccess(player);
	
	/*
	 * To use the values of the bardata
	 * with the keyword e
	 */
	for(BarData e: BarData.values()) {
		
		/*
		 * If the button we clicked is in the enum 
		 * continue, if not returns.
		 */
		if(button == e.getFiveButton()) {
			
			/*
			 * If the level is not the required
			 */
			if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] < e.getRequiredLevel()) {
				player.sM("You need a level of"+e.getRequiredLevel()+" to smelt this ore");
				return;
			}
			
			/*
			 * If the player has the 	required level on smelting continue
			 * 
			 * if the player has the primary ore and its required amount continue
			 * 
			 * if the player has the secondary ore and its required amount continue
			 * 
			 * if the player isn't producing any bars, continue
			 * 
			 * if the player isn't making iron continue
			 */
			if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] >= e.getRequiredLevel() && Misc.hasItemAmount(player, e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre()) && Misc.hasItemAmount(player, e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre()) && !player.isProducingBars && !e.name().equalsIgnoreCase("iron")) {
				
				/*
				 * a flag to tell if we are producing bars or not, is set to true
				 */
				player.isProducingBars = true;
				
				/*
				 * We add a check, so it will only work if the player is actually producing bars
				 */
				if(player.isProducingBars) {
					player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
				}
			} 	
			
			/*
			 * if we are doing iron apply the 50% chances
			 */
			if(e.name().equalsIgnoreCase("iron")) {
				if(player.refiningSuccess) {
					//player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
					Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
				} else {
					player.sM("The ore was too impure to refine it");
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					
				}
			}
		}
	}
	Server.getTaskScheduler().schedule(new Task(2, true) {
		private int count = ticks;
		
		@Override
		protected void execute() {
			if (count > 0)
				count--;
			 else {
				smeltTeneOre(player, button, ticks);
				stop();
			}
		}
	});
}[/code]

I know i should use varargs or something for the x, this will be removed asap as i adapt it for the x button
[/quote]
That’s horrible.[/quote]I know :(, I’m making a method that can be used for one, 5, 10, or whatever that is put on the parameters, instead of this :s

I’ll share it when i’m done.

Read full topic

item.title: Quality smelting base
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:8, topic:534212”]thanks guys i love you all <3

edit to make it iterate for 10 times here

[code] /*
* To make the ore smelt five times, the code will be called, over and over, until its not needed
*
* @param player
* the player that will smelt the five ores
*
* @param button
* the button that the player will click
*
* @param ticks
* the number of ticks before we smelt again
*/
public static void smeltTeneOre(final Player player, final int button, final int ticks) {

	/*
	 * If it has already been executed 5 times
	 * set the times to 5 again, and returns
	 * so we dont execute the code again
	 */
	if(player.tenTimes == 0) {
		player.tenTimes = 10;
		return;
	}
	
	/*
	 * Decreases the times that it 
	 * has to be executed
	 */
	player.tenTimes --;
	
	/*
	 * Closes the interface made on the chatbox to pick the bar, we don't want the player
	 * to click the interface over and over again.
	 */
	player.closeInterface();
	
	/*
	 * A new chance of being true or false 
	 * used for the iron making wich is 50% made and 50% lost
	 */
	randomizeSuccess(player);
	
	/*
	 * To use the values of the bardata
	 * with the keyword e
	 */
	for(BarData e: BarData.values()) {
		
		/*
		 * If the button we clicked is in the enum 
		 * continue, if not returns.
		 */
		if(button == e.getFiveButton()) {
			
			/*
			 * If the level is not the required
			 */
			if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] < e.getRequiredLevel()) {
				player.sM("You need a level of"+e.getRequiredLevel()+" to smelt this ore");
				return;
			}
			
			/*
			 * If the player has the 	required level on smelting continue
			 * 
			 * if the player has the primary ore and its required amount continue
			 * 
			 * if the player has the secondary ore and its required amount continue
			 * 
			 * if the player isn't producing any bars, continue
			 * 
			 * if the player isn't making iron continue
			 */
			if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] >= e.getRequiredLevel() && Misc.hasItemAmount(player, e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre()) && Misc.hasItemAmount(player, e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre()) && !player.isProducingBars && !e.name().equalsIgnoreCase("iron")) {
				
				/*
				 * a flag to tell if we are producing bars or not, is set to true
				 */
				player.isProducingBars = true;
				
				/*
				 * We add a check, so it will only work if the player is actually producing bars
				 */
				if(player.isProducingBars) {
					player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
				}
			} 	
			
			/*
			 * if we are doing iron apply the 50% chances
			 */
			if(e.name().equalsIgnoreCase("iron")) {
				if(player.refiningSuccess) {
					//player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
					Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
				} else {
					player.sM("The ore was too impure to refine it");
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					
				}
			}
		}
	}
	Server.getTaskScheduler().schedule(new Task(2, true) {
		private int count = ticks;
		
		@Override
		protected void execute() {
			if (count > 0)
				count--;
			 else {
				smeltTeneOre(player, button, ticks);
				stop();
			}
		}
	});
}[/code]

I know i should use varargs or something for the x, this will be removed asap as i adapt it for the x button[/quote]
That’s horrible.

thanks guys i love you all <3

edit to make it iterate for 10 times here

[code] /*
* To make the ore smelt five times, the code will be called, over and over, until its not needed
*
* @param player
* the player that will smelt the five ores
*
* @param button
* the button that the player will click
*
* @param ticks
* the number of ticks before we smelt again
*/
public static void smeltTeneOre(final Player player, final int button, final int ticks) {

	/*
	 * If it has already been executed 5 times
	 * set the times to 5 again, and returns
	 * so we dont execute the code again
	 */
	if(player.tenTimes == 0) {
		player.tenTimes = 10;
		return;
	}
	
	/*
	 * Decreases the times that it 
	 * has to be executed
	 */
	player.tenTimes --;
	
	/*
	 * Closes the interface made on the chatbox to pick the bar, we don't want the player
	 * to click the interface over and over again.
	 */
	player.closeInterface();
	
	/*
	 * A new chance of being true or false 
	 * used for the iron making wich is 50% made and 50% lost
	 */
	randomizeSuccess(player);
	
	/*
	 * To use the values of the bardata
	 * with the keyword e
	 */
	for(BarData e: BarData.values()) {
		
		/*
		 * If the button we clicked is in the enum 
		 * continue, if not returns.
		 */
		if(button == e.getFiveButton()) {
			
			/*
			 * If the level is not the required
			 */
			if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] < e.getRequiredLevel()) {
				player.sM("You need a level of"+e.getRequiredLevel()+" to smelt this ore");
				return;
			}
			
			/*
			 * If the player has the 	required level on smelting continue
			 * 
			 * if the player has the primary ore and its required amount continue
			 * 
			 * if the player has the secondary ore and its required amount continue
			 * 
			 * if the player isn't producing any bars, continue
			 * 
			 * if the player isn't making iron continue
			 */
			if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] >= e.getRequiredLevel() && Misc.hasItemAmount(player, e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre()) && Misc.hasItemAmount(player, e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre()) && !player.isProducingBars && !e.name().equalsIgnoreCase("iron")) {
				
				/*
				 * a flag to tell if we are producing bars or not, is set to true
				 */
				player.isProducingBars = true;
				
				/*
				 * We add a check, so it will only work if the player is actually producing bars
				 */
				if(player.isProducingBars) {
					player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
				}
			} 	
			
			/*
			 * if we are doing iron apply the 50% chances
			 */
			if(e.name().equalsIgnoreCase("iron")) {
				if(player.refiningSuccess) {
					//player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
					Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
				} else {
					player.sM("The ore was too impure to refine it");
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
					Misc.deleteItems(player,e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
					player.isProducingBars = false;
					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
					
				}
			}
		}
	}
	Server.getTaskScheduler().schedule(new Task(2, true) {
		private int count = ticks;
		
		@Override
		protected void execute() {
			if (count > 0)
				count--;
			 else {
				smeltTeneOre(player, button, ticks);
				stop();
			}
		}
	});
}[/code]

item.title: Quality smelting base
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

almost finished

[code=java]package server.euthymia.entity.player.skill;

import server.euthymia.entity.player.*;
import server.euthymia.entity.player.misc.Misc;

/**

  • @author Arthur98 - Strucker - Mr_Boogie
    */
    public class SmeltingHandler {

    /*

    • The smelting skill id
      */
      public static final int SMELTING_SKILL_ID = 13;

    /*

    • The animation id
      */
      public static final int SMELTING_ANIMATION = 899;

    /*

    • The smelting sound
      */
      public static final int SMELTING_SOUND = 235;

    /*

    • Sends the smelting interface
    • @param player the player that will have the interface opened
    • @param object the object that will open the interface
      */
      public static void sendSmeltingInterface(Player player, int object) {
      switch (object) {
      case 11666:
      case 2781:
      player.faceNPC(object);
      makeInterface(player);
      break;
      }
      }

    /*

    • Makes the interface on the chatbox and adds the bars to the interface
      */
      private static void makeInterface(Player player) {
      player.sendFrame164(2400);
      player.sendFrame246(2405, 200, 2349);
      player.sendFrame246(2406, 200, 2351);
      player.sendFrame246(2408, 200, 2355);
      player.sendFrame246(2409, 200, 2353);
      player.sendFrame246(2410, 200, 2357);
      player.sendFrame246(2411, 200, 2359);
      player.sendFrame246(2412, 200, 2361);
      player.sendFrame246(2413, 200, 2363);
      }

    /*

    • Smelts the ore into bars when the button is clicked
    • @param player
    •  the player that will smelt the ore
    • @param button
    •  the button that the player will click to start making the bars

    /
    public static void smeltOre(Player player, int button) {
    /
    * Closes the interface made on the chatbox to pick the bar, we don’t want the player
    * to click the interface over and over again.
    */
    player.closeInterface();

     /*
  * A new chance of being true or false 
  * used for the iron making wich is 50% made and 50% lost
  */
 randomizeSuccess(player);
 
 /*
  * To use the values of the bardata
  * with the keyword e
  */
 for(BarData e: BarData.values()) {
 	
 	/*
 	 * If the button we clicked is in the enum 
 	 * continue, if not returns.
 	 */
 	if(button == e.getButton()) {
 		player.sM("debug button");
 		/*
 		 * If the player has the required level on smelting continue
 		 * 
 		 * if the player has the primary ore and its required amount continue
 		 * 
 		 * if the player has the secondary ore and its required amount continue
 		 * 
 		 * if the player isn't producing any bars, continue
 		 */
 		if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] < e.getRequiredLevel()) {
 			player.sM("You need a level of"+e.getRequiredLevel()+" to smelt this ore");
 		}
 		if(player.playerLevel[SMELTING_SKILL_ID] >= e.getRequiredLevel() && player.HasItemAmount(e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre()) && player.HasItemAmount(e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre()) && !player.isProducingBars) {
 			player.sM("Is producing bars");
 			/*
 			 * a flag to tell if we are producing bars or not, is set to true
 			 */
 			player.isProducingBars = true;
 			
 			/*
 			 * if we are doing iron apply the 50% chances
 			 */
 			if(e.name().equalsIgnoreCase("iron")) {
 				if(player.refiningSuccess) {
 					player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
 					Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
 					player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
 					player.deleteItem(e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
 					player.isProducingBars = false;
 					player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
 				} else {
 					player.sM("The ore was too impure to refine it");
 					player.deleteItem(e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
 					player.isProducingBars = false;
 					player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
 					
 				}
 				return;
 			}
 			player.addSkillXP(e.getExperience(), SMELTING_SKILL_ID);
 			player.startAnimation(SMELTING_ANIMATION);
 			Sounds.playerSoundEffect(player, SMELTING_SOUND);
 			player.addItem(e.getBar(), 1);
 			player.deleteItem(e.getPrimaryOre(), e.getAmountOfPrimaryOre());
 			player.deleteItem(e.getSecondaryOre(), e.getAmountOfSecondaryOre());
 			player.isProducingBars = false;
 			player.sM("You make a "+e.name().toLowerCase()+" bar");
 		} 
 		
 	}
 }

    }

    /*

    • Randomizes the succes 50% can be true but 50% can be false
    • @param player
    •  the player that will have his succes randomized

    */
    private static void randomizeSuccess(Player player) {
    switch(Misc.random(2)) {
    case 0:
    player.refiningSuccess = true;
    break;
    case 1:
    player.refiningSuccess = false;
    break;
    }
    }

    private enum BarData {
    BRONZE(436, 438, 1, 1, 1, 6, 2349, 15147, 15146, 10247),
    IRON(440, -1, 1, -1, 15, 12, 2351, 15151, 15150, 15149),
    STEEL(440, 453, 1, 2, 30, 18, 2353, 15159, 15158, 15157),
    MITHRIL(447, 453, 1, 4, 55, 30, 2359, 29017, 29025, 24253),
    ADAMANT(449, 453, 1, 6, 75, 38, 2361, 29026, 29016, 29019),
    RUNE(451, 453, 1, 8, 80, 50, 2363, 29022, 29020, 29024);

     private int primaryOre, secondaryOre, requiredPrimaryOre, requiredSecondaryOre, requiredLevel, experience, bar;

 private int makeButton, makeFiveButton, makeTenButton;
 
 private BarData(int primaryOre, int secondaryOre, int requiredPrimaryOre, int requiredSecondaryOre, int requiredLevel, int experience, int bar, int makeButton, int makeFiveButton, int makeTenButton) {
 	this.primaryOre = primaryOre;
 	this.secondaryOre = secondaryOre;
 	this.requiredPrimaryOre = requiredPrimaryOre;
 	this.requiredSecondaryOre = requiredSecondaryOre;
 	this.requiredLevel = requiredLevel;
 	this.experience = experience;
 	this.bar = bar;
 	this.makeButton = makeButton;
 	this.makeFiveButton = makeFiveButton;
 	this.makeTenButton = makeTenButton;
 }
 
 /*
  * Gets the primary ore
  */
 private int getPrimaryOre() {
 	return primaryOre;
 }
 
 /*
  * Gets the secondary ore
  */
 private int getSecondaryOre() {
 	return secondaryOre;
 }
 
 /*
  * Gets the amount of primary ore needed
  */
 private int getAmountOfPrimaryOre() {
 	return requiredPrimaryOre;
 }
 
 /*
  * Gets the amount of secondary ore needed
  */
 private int getAmountOfSecondaryOre() {
 	return requiredSecondaryOre;
 }
 
 /*
  * Gets the required level 
  */
 private int getRequiredLevel() {
 	return requiredLevel;
 }
 
 /*
  * Returns the experience multiplied by the xprate
  */
 private int getExperience() {
 	return experience * Config.xpRate;
 }
 
 /*
  * returns the bar made
  */
 private int getBar() {
 	return bar;
 }
 
 /*
  * Returns the button clicked
  */
 private int getButton() {
 	return makeButton;
 }
 
 /*
  * Returns the button clicked
  */
 private int getFiveButton() {
 	return makeFiveButton;
 }
 
 /*
  * returns the button clicked
  */
 private int getTenButton() {
 	return makeTenButton;
 }

    }

}[/code]

Read full topic
